amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to direct the Office of Government Ethics to promulgate rules to apply ethics laws to unpaid employees of the Executive Office of the President and the White House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Jayapal.
